ruling: - You can activate [[Chain Destruction]] when you or your opponent Summons the monster.
- If you activate [[Chain Destruction]] when a Fusion Monster is Summoned, monsters in the Fusion Deck with the same name as the Summoned monster are destroyed.
- If an effect is chained that increases the Summoned monster's ATK above 2000 or removes it from the field, [[Chain Destruction]]'s effect is still applied.
